#summary Configuration file for Filters

{{{
<!--The list of filters configured in the application-->
<app>
    <filters>
        <!--A filter configured for request level filtering and the first filter in the chain-->
        <filter order="1" type="request" class="ExampleRequestFilter" url="*.htm,*.do"/>
        <!--A filter configured for response level filtering and the second filter in the chain-->
        <filter order="2" type="response" class="ExampleResponseFilter" url="*.htm,*.do"/>
    </filters>
</app>
}}}
